DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness PROMUS™ Element™ Everolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent System treatment subject China single de novo atherosclerotic coronary artery lesion .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Randomized , Multicenter Trial Assess Everolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent System ( PROMUS™ Element™ ) Treatment Single De Novo Coronary Artery Lesion
DOC.criteria: Clinical Subject must age 18 75 year Subject ( legal guardian ) understand trial requirement treatment procedure provide write informed consent trial specific test procedure perform Subject eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Subject symptomatic coronary artery disease document silent ischemia Subject acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) Subject leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) ≥30 % measure within 60 day prior enrollment Subject willing comply protocolrequired followup evaluation Angiographic Target lesion must de novo lesion locate native coronary artery visually estimate reference vessel diameter ( RVD ) ≥2.50 mm ≤ 4.00 mm . Target lesion length must measure < 38 mm ( visual estimate ) Target lesion must visually estimate stenosis ≥50 % < 100 % Thrombolysis Myocardial Infarction ( TIMI ) flow > 1 . Target lesion must successfully predilated . Subject clinical symptom and/or electrocardiogram ( ECG ) change consistent acute MI Subject unstable angina recent MI ( within 1 week ) must creatine kinase ( CK ) / creatine kinasemyoglobin band ( CKMB ) troponin document prior procedure exclude follow criterion meet time index procedure : CK MB > 2× upper limit normal ( ULN ) , subject exclude regardless CK Total . If CK Total > 2× ULN , either CKMB troponin must draw subject exclude either CKMB troponin abnormal . If neither CK Total CK MB drawn troponin , subject exclude troponin > 1× ULN subject least one following : Subject ischemic symptom ECG change indicative ongoing ischemia ( e.g. , > 1 mm stent thrombosis ( ST ) segment elevation depression consecutive lead new left bundle branch block [ LBBB ] ) Development pathological Q wave ECG ; Imaging evidence new loss viable myocardium new regional wall motion abnormality Note : Subjects recent MI unstable angina must still CK/CKMB troponin drawn prior index procedure . However , result subject need available prior index procedure exclusion criterion base laboratory study . Subject receive organ transplant wait list organ transplant Subject receiving schedule receive chemotherapy within 30 day index procedure Subject receive oral intravenous immunosuppressive therapy ( Note : use inhale steroid exclude subject ) know life limit immunosuppressive autoimmune disease ( e.g. , human immunodeficiency virus , systemic lupus erythematosus ; Note : include diabetes mellitus
